name: TopSolid'Viewer Document
summary: A TOPVIW file is a CAD document created by TopSolid, a CAD design and product data management (PDM) application. It contains a CAD drawing exported from TopSolid, but does not include all design information such as the complete models and Bill of Materials (BoM) data. TOPVIW files can be opened with the free TopSolid'Viewer program.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
